name: Vectorace
description:
Introduction

Vectorace is a short and simple puzzle game made out of flashing squares.

The goal of the game is to progress from level to level by moving onto the colorful bright flashing squares.

Some levels require you to be fast, others smart. Any mistake will re-spawn you at the start of the level, allowing you to try again right away.

The game is not suited for people with photosensitive epilepsy.

Controls

Arrow keys or W A S D to move
Space bar to change color
R to restart whole game
Esc to quit

Controls can not be rebound.

Details

I made this game because I had the concept in my head for a while and I wanted to make it a reality. 

This game was made using the GDevelop engine, this allowed me to create this game without needing to know how to program.

This game was made only by me, Roel Hamersma, in a few days.

The game is unlikely to be improved or updated but even a small donation can convince me to update the game.

Features I would add if I would continue development

- More and better levels
- A save feature
- A level select hub-world
- Better art and effects
